'''Zoo Tycoon''' is an [[achievement]] set in the category ''[[Wonders of the World]]''. The achievements are earned by using the [[Omni-Ubiquity Net]] item to capture [[Wildlife|wild animals]].

==Trivia==
* The name is a reference to the simulation game series called {{w|Zoo Tycoon}} published by Microsoft.
